name: bot-mox-project
description: Bot-Mox Project - Bot Farm Management System

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd proxy-server && npm install && cd ../bot-mox && npm install
scripts.check:backend:syntax: node --check proxy-server/src/index.js && node --check proxy-server/src/legacy-app.js && node --check proxy-server/src/bootstrap/firebase-admin.js && node --check proxy-server/src/bootstrap/runtime.js && node --check proxy-server/src/bootstrap/http-middleware.js && node --check proxy-server/src/bootstrap/ui-targets.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/infra/connectors.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/infra/service.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/infra/ui-proxy-stack.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/infra/vm-operations-ws.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/infra/ui-service-auth.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/infra/ui-proxy-routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/infra/ui-proxy-upgrade.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/infra/ui-fallback-middleware.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/vm-registry/service.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/license/service.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/artifacts/service.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/agents/service.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/secrets/service.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/vm-ops/service.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/index.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/health.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/auth.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/resources.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/workspace.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/settings.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/bots.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/finance.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/infra.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/ipqs.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/wow-names.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/vm.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/license.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/artifacts.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/agents.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/secrets.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/modules/v1/vm-ops.routes.js && node --check proxy-server/src/repositories/rtdb/tenant-paths.js && node --check proxy-server/src/repositories/supabase/client.js && node --check proxy-server/src/repositories/supabase/storage-policy-repository.js && node --check proxy-server/src/repositories/s3/storage-provider.js && node --check proxy-server/src/repositories/repository-factory.js && node --check proxy-server/src/repositories/supabase/supabase-collection-repository.js
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run check:types && npm run build && npm run check:bundle:budgets && npm run check:secrets && npm run check:backend:syntax && npm run check:backend:smoke
scripts.mcp:antd:setup: npm install --no-save https://codeload.github.com/ant-design/ant-design/tar.gz/refs/heads/master && node node_modules/mcp-antd-components/scripts/extract-docs.mjs node_modules/antd && npm uninstall --no-save antd
